name: A★MAZE
description:
A real living labyrinth filled with treasures and dangerous rivals!

Goal of the game: collect the required amount of treasures and return to the starting point.Players take turns, the character moves first. 

After moving, you can change the structure of the maze using one of the available arrows.Changing the structure of the maze ends the turn!If a treasure was taken this turn, the turn automatically ends. 

The winner is the one who first collected the treasures and returned to the starting point!

If you encounter an error, email me at plague.gmz@gmail.com
